pageProduct.name: Oil Garden Baby Relax Massage Oil 125ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Help baby relax with the Oil Garden Baby Massage Oil.

Warnings

STORE BELOW 30°C. NOT TO BE TAKEN ORALLY. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. AVOID CONTACT WITH EYES.

Common Uses

Baby Massage Oil

Ingredients

Sweet Orange (Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Oil), Australian Mandarin (Citrus Nobilis Peel Oil), Geranium (Pelargonium Graveolens Leaf Oil), Lavender (Lavandula Angustifolia Oil), Roman Chamomile (Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil) and Rose Otto (Rosa Damascena Flower Oil) combined with natural carrier oils of Sunflower (Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil), Grapeseed (Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil), Jojoba (Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil) and Sweet Almond (Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil) stabilised with Vitamin E (Tocopherol).

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Place a few drops of the massage oil in your hands, and rub together to warm. Gently apply to your child in relaxing, soft motions.
